entry.title: Julien added 'Eye of the Needle'
entry.content: 📚 “Eye of the Needle” by Ken Follett ⭐️ Rated: 3/5 📝 "Eye of the Needle takes a while to get going, about halfway through, the suspense really kicks in, but once it does, it’s an effective and gripping spy thriller. The interwoven narratives slowly build tension, leading to a frantic and rewarding conclusion. its structure and pacing ultimately deliver a solid Second World War-era tale of espionage and survival. —— Eye of the Needle met du temps à vraiment démarrer,ce n’est qu’à mi-parcours que le suspense prend de l’ampleur, mais une fois lancé, c..." 🏷️ #KenFollett

entry.title: Julien added 'The Case of the Ice-cold Hands'
entry.content: 📚 “The Case of the Ice-cold Hands” by Erle Stanley Gardner ⭐️ Rated: 3/5 📝 "The Case of the Ice-Cold Hands is a later entry in the Perry Mason series, but Gardner still brings the punch. What really keeps the series appealing is the dynamic between the three main characters, Mason, Della, and their occasionally screwball relationship, with Paul Drake playing the perfect third wheel. The crime in this one is fairly standard, and the plot follows familiar beats, but an unexpected twist during a rare grand jury appearance makes it all worthwhile. —— Un tome tardif dans la..." 🏷️ #ErleStanleyGardner
